name: Daily Collection Report
query:
select 
	name as `Name:Link/Payment Entry:150`, 
	letter_head as `Letter Head:Data:100`, 
	posting_date as `Date:Date:100`, 
	mode_of_payment as `Mode of Payment:Data:100`, 
	party_name as `Party Name:Data:150`, 
	paid_amount as `Amount:Float:100`
from 
	`tabPayment Entry` 
where 
	payment_type='Receive' 
	and posting_date>=%(from_date)s
    and posting_date<=%(to_date)s
    and docstatus=1 
    and letter_head=%(let)s
